import { motion, useScroll, useMotionValue } from 'framer-motion'
import { useRef, useEffect } from 'react'

export default function Imgslide() {
  const slides = [
    {
      img: "/an phuu.jpg",
      title: 'Vá»‹ trÃ­ "kim cÆ°Æ¡ng" An PhÃº',
      desc: 'Káº¿t ná»‘i hoÃ n háº£oâ€¦',
    },
    {
      img: "/an phuoke.jpg",
      title: 'Khu Ä‘Ã´ thá»‹ ven sÃ´ng',
      desc: 'Thiáº¿t káº¿ thÃ´ng minh, sá»‘ng xanh má»—i ngÃ y.',
    },
    {
      img: "/masterise.webp",

    }
  ]

  return (
    <section className="w-full h-screen overflow-hidden relative cursor-grab">
      <Swiper
        modules={[Pagination]}
        pagination={{

          background-color: #ccc;
          width: 10px;

          margin: 0 6px;

          height: 12px;

    </section>

}

function SlideItem({ img, title, desc, uniqueKey }) {
  const sectionRef = useRef(null)
  const { scrollYProgress } = useScroll({
    target: sectionRef,
    offset: ['start center', 'end center']
  })

  const imageX = useMotionValue('50%')
  const textX = useMotionValue('-30%')
  const textOpacity = useMotionValue(0)

  useEffect(() => {
    const unsubscribe = scrollYProgress.on('change', (v) => {
 if (v >= 0.4) {
  setTimeout(() => {
    imageX.set('9%')
    textX.set('0%')
    textOpacity.set(1)
  }, 200) // delay 200ms
}

    })
    return () => unsubscribe()
  }, [uniqueKey]) // khi slide Ä‘á»•i â†’ re-run

  return (
    <div ref={sectionRef} className="relative w-full h-screen overflow-hidden">
   <motion.img
  src={img}
  style={{ x: imageX }}
  className="absolute top-0 left-0 w-full h-full object-cover"
  transition={{ type: 'spring', stiffness: 40, damping: 15 }} // ğŸ‘ˆ chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»™ng mÆ°á»£t
/>


      {/* Optional: overlay má» áº£nh */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 z-10" />

      <motion.div
        style={{ x: textX, opacity: textOpacity }}
        className="absolute bottom-20 left-[50px] xl:left-[160px] z-20"
      >
        <h2 className="text-3xl font-semibold text-white xl:text-5xl">{title}</h2>
        <p className="text-white mt-1 max-w-md xl:text-2xl">{desc}</p>
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  )
}

### ğŸ“ `FeatureSection.jsx`

```jsx
import { useState } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from "swiper/react";
import "swiper/css";

const featureData = {
  "Tiá»‡n Ã­ch": {
    "NgoÃ i trá»i": ["/outdoor1.jpg", "/outdoor2.jpg"],
    "Trong nhÃ ": ["/indoor1.jpg", "/indoor2.jpg"],
  },
  "Ná»™i tháº¥t": {
    "Studio": ["/studio1.jpg", "/studio2.jpg"],
    "1 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/1pn1.jpg", "/1pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/2pn1.jpg", "/2pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§ +": ["/2pnplus1.jpg", "/2pnplus2.jpg"],
    "3 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/3pn1.jpg", "/3pn2.jpg"],
  },
};

export default function FeatureSection() {
  const tabNames = Object.keys(featureData);
  const [mainTab, setMainTab] = useState(tabNames[0]);
  const subTabNames = Object.keys(featureData[mainTab]);
  const [subTab, setSubTab] = useState(subTabNames[0]);

  return (
    <section className="p-4">
      {/* Main Tabs */}
      <div className="flex gap-4 border-b mb-4">
        {tabNames.map((tab) => (
          <button
            key={tab}
            className={`py-2 px-4 font-semibold ${
              tab === mainTab ? "border-b-2 border-black" : "text-gray-500"
            }`}
            onClick={() => {
              setMainTab(tab);
              const firstSub = Object.keys(featureData[tab])[0];
              setSubTab(firstSub);
            }}
          >
            {tab}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Sub Tabs */}
      <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
        {Object.keys(featureData[mainTab]).map((name) => (
          <button
            key={name}
            className={`py-1 px-3 rounded-full border ${
              name === subTab
                ? "bg-black text-white"
                : "bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-100"
            }`}
            onClick={() => setSubTab(name)}
          >
            {name}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Swiper */}
      <motion.div
        key={subTab}
        initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
        animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
      >
        <Swiper spaceBetween={16} slidesPerView={1.2}>
          {featureData[mainTab][subTab].map((img, i) => (
            <SwiperSlide key={i}>
              <img src={img} alt={subTab} className="rounded-xl w-full" />
            </SwiperSlide>
          ))}
        </Swiper>
      </motion.div>
    </section>
  );
}
```

}

```jsx
import { useState, useRef } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from "swiper/react";
import "swiper/css";

const featureData = {
  "Tiá»‡n Ã­ch": {
    "NgoÃ i trá»i": ["/ngoai troi.jpeg", "/ngoai troi 2.jpeg"],
    "Trong nhÃ ": ["/trong nha.jpg", "/trong nha 2.jpg"],
  },
  "Ná»™i tháº¥t": {
    "Studio": ["/studio1.jpg", "/studio2.jpg"],
    "1 phÃ²ng ngá»§+": ["/1pn1.jpg", "/1pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/2pn1.jpg", "/2pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§ +": ["/2pnplus1.jpg", "/2pnplus2.jpg", "/2pnplus3.jpg"],
    "3 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/3pn1.jpg", "/3pn2.jpg", "/3pn3.jpg", "/3pn4.jpg", "/3pn5.jpg"],
  },
};

export default function FeatureSection() {
  const tabNames = Object.keys(featureData);
  const [mainTab, setMainTab] = useState(tabNames[0]);
  const [subTab, setSubTab] = useState(Object.keys(featureData[mainTab])[0]);
  const swiperRef = useRef(null);

  const subTabList = Object.keys(featureData[mainTab]);

  const allImages = subTabList.flatMap((name) =>
    featureData[mainTab][name].map((img) => ({ name, img }))
  );

  const findStartIndex = (subTabName) => {
    let index = 0;
    for (let name of subTabList) {
      if (name === subTabName) break;
      index += featureData[mainTab][name].length;
    }
    return index;
  };

  const handleSubTabClick = (name) => {
    setSubTab(name);
    const index = findStartIndex(name);
    swiperRef.current?.slideTo(index);
  };

  return (
    <section className="p-4">
      {/* Main Tabs */}
      <div className="flex gap-4 border-b mb-4">
        {tabNames.map((tab) => (
          <button
            key={tab}
            className={`py-2 px-4 font-semibold ${
              tab === mainTab ? "border-b-2 border-black" : "text-gray-500"
            }`}
            onClick={() => {
              setMainTab(tab);
              const firstSub = Object.keys(featureData[tab])[0];
              setSubTab(firstSub);
            }}
          >
            {tab}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Sub Tabs */}
      <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
        {subTabList.map((name) => (
          <button
            key={name}
            className={`py-1 px-3 rounded-full border ${
              name === subTab
                ? "bg-black text-white"
                : "bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-100"
            }`}
            onClick={() => handleSubTabClick(name)}
          >
            {name}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Swiper */}
      <motion.div
        key={mainTab}
        initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
        animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
      >
        <Swiper
          spaceBetween={16}
          slidesPerView={1.2}
          onSwiper={(swiper) => (swiperRef.current = swiper)}
          onSlideChange={(swiper) => {
            const imgIndex = swiper.activeIndex;
            let count = 0;
            for (let name of subTabList) {
              const length = featureData[mainTab][name].length;
              if (imgIndex < count + length) {
                setSubTab(name);
                break;
              }
              count += length;
            }
          }}
        >
          {allImages.map((item, i) => (
            <SwiperSlide key={i}>
              <img
                src={item.img}
                alt={item.name}
                className="rounded-xl w-full object-cover"
              />
            </SwiperSlide>
          ))}
        </Swiper>
      </motion.div>
    </section>
  );
}
```

```tsx
import { useState, useMemo } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from "swiper/react";
import SwiperCore from "swiper";
import "swiper/css";

const featureData = {
  "Tiá»‡n Ã­ch": {
    "NgoÃ i trá»i": ["/ngoai troi.jpeg", "/ngoai troi 2.jpeg"],
    "Trong nhÃ ": ["/trong nha.jpg", "/trong nha 2.jpg"],
  },
  "Ná»™i tháº¥t": {
    "Studio": ["/studio1.jpg", "/studio2.jpg"],
    "1 phÃ²ng ngá»§+": ["/1pn1.jpg", "/1pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/2pn1.jpg", "/2pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§ +": ["/2pnplus1.jpg", "/2pnplus2.jpg", "/2pnplus3.jpg"],
    "3 phÃ²ng ngá»§": [
      "/3pn1.jpg",
      "/3pn2.jpg",
      "/3pn3.jpg",
      "/3pn4.jpg",
      "/3pn5.jpg",
    ],
  },
};

export default function TabSwiperAuto() {
  const tabNames = Object.keys(featureData);
  const [mainTab, setMainTab] = useState(tabNames[0]);

  const subTabNames = useMemo(
    () => Object.keys(featureData[mainTab]),
    [mainTab]
  );
  const [subTab, setSubTab] = useState(subTabNames[0]);

  // Gá»™p toÃ n bá»™ áº£nh + mapping Ä‘á»ƒ biáº¿t index nÃ o thuá»™c subTab nÃ o
  const flatImages = useMemo(() => {
    const all: { img: string; sub: string }[] = [];
    for (const sub of subTabNames) {
      featureData[mainTab][sub].forEach((img) =>
        all.push({ img, sub })
      );
    }
    return all;
  }, [mainTab]);

  return (
    <section className="p-4">
      {/* Main Tabs */}
      <div className="flex gap-4 border-b mb-4">
        {tabNames.map((tab) => (
          <button
            key={tab}
            className={`py-2 px-4 font-semibold ${
              tab === mainTab
                ? "border-b-2 border-black"
                : "text-gray-500"
            }`}
            onClick={() => {
              setMainTab(tab);
              setSubTab(Object.keys(featureData[tab])[0]);
            }}
          >
            {tab}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Sub Tabs */}
      <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
        {subTabNames.map((name) => (
          <button
            key={name}
            className={`py-1 px-3 rounded-full border transition ${
              name === subTab
                ? "bg-black text-white"
                : "bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-100"
            }`}
            onClick={() => {
              setSubTab(name);
            }}
          >
            {name}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Swiper */}
      <motion.div
        key={mainTab}
        initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
        animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
      >
        <Swiper
          spaceBetween={16}
          slidesPerView={1.2}
          loop={true}
          onSlideChange={(swiper: SwiperCore) => {
            const index = swiper.realIndex;
            const current = flatImages[index]?.sub;
            if (current && current !== subTab) {
              setSubTab(current);
            }
          }}
        >
          {flatImages.map((item, i) => (
            <SwiperSlide key={i}>
              <img
                src={item.img}
                alt={item.sub}
                className="rounded-xl w-full object-cover"
              />
            </SwiperSlide>
          ))}
        </Swiper>
      </motion.div>
    </section>
  );
}
```

### âœ… File `FeatureTabs.tsx` (báº£n hoÃ n chá»‰nh, copy dÃ¡n nguyÃªn file)

```tsx
import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from "swiper/react";
import SwiperCore from "swiper";
import "swiper/css";

const featureData = {
  "Tiá»‡n Ã­ch": {
    "NgoÃ i trá»i": ["/ngoai troi.jpeg", "/ngoai troi 2.jpeg"],
    "Trong nhÃ ": ["/trong nha.jpg", "/trong nha 2.jpg"],
  },
  "Ná»™i tháº¥t": {
    "Studio": ["/studio1.jpg", "/studio2.jpg"],
    "1 phÃ²ng ngá»§+": ["/1pn1.jpg", "/1pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/2pn1.jpg", "/2pn2.jpg"],
    "2 phÃ²ng ngá»§ +": ["/2pnplus1.jpg", "/2pnplus2.jpg", "/2pnplus3.jpg"],
    "3 phÃ²ng ngá»§": ["/3pn1.jpg", "/3pn2.jpg", "/3pn3.jpg", "/3pn4.jpg", "/3pn5.jpg"],
  },
};

export default function FeatureTabs() {
  const tabNames = Object.keys(featureData);
  const [mainTab, setMainTab] = useState(tabNames[0]);
  const subTabNames = Object.keys(featureData[mainTab]);
  const [subTab, setSubTab] = useState(subTabNames[0]);
  const swiperRef = useRef<SwiperCore | null>(null);

  // Táº¡o máº£ng tá»•ng há»£p áº£nh vÃ  Ä‘Ã¡nh dáº¥u áº£nh thuá»™c subTab nÃ o
  const flatImages = Object.entries(featureData[mainTab]).flatMap(([sub, imgs]) =>
    imgs.map((img) => ({ img, sub }))
  );

  // TÃ¬m index Ä‘áº§u tiÃªn cá»§a subTab hiá»‡n táº¡i
  const currentSubStartIndex = flatImages.findIndex((item) => item.sub === subTab);

  // Xá»­ lÃ½ khi swipe
  const handleSlideChange = (swiper: SwiperCore) => {
    const currentIndex = swiper.activeIndex;
    const currentItem = flatImages[currentIndex];

    if (currentItem && currentItem.sub !== subTab) {
      setSubTab(currentItem.sub);
    }
  };

  // Khi Ä‘á»•i tab chÃ­nh, reset sub tab
  useEffect(() => {
    const firstSub = Object.keys(featureData[mainTab])[0];
    setSubTab(firstSub);
  }, [mainTab]);

  return (
    <section className="p-4">
      {/* Main Tabs */}
      <div className="flex gap-4 border-b mb-4">
        {tabNames.map((tab) => (
          <button
            key={tab}
            className={`py-2 px-4 font-semibold ${
              tab === mainTab ? "border-b-2 border-black" : "text-gray-500"
            }`}
            onClick={() => setMainTab(tab)}
          >
            {tab}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Sub Tabs */}
      <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
        {Object.keys(featureData[mainTab]).map((name) => (
          <button
            key={name}
            className={`py-1 px-3 rounded-full border ${
              name === subTab
                ? "bg-black text-white"
                : "bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-100"
            }`}
            onClick={() => {
              setSubTab(name);
              const index = flatImages.findIndex((item) => item.sub === name);
              swiperRef.current?.slideTo(index);
            }}
          >
            {name}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Swiper */}
      <motion.div
        key={mainTab}
        initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
        animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
      >
        <Swiper
          spaceBetween={16}
          slidesPerView={1.2}
          onSwiper={(swiper) => (swiperRef.current = swiper)}
          onSlideChange={handleSlideChange}
          loop={true}
          initialSlide={currentSubStartIndex}
        >
          {flatImages.map((item, i) => (
            <SwiperSlide key={i}>
              <img
                src={item.img}
                alt={item.sub}
                className="rounded-xl w-full object-cover"
              />
            </SwiperSlide>
          ))}
        </Swiper>
      </motion.div>
    </section>
  );
}
```

```jsx
// Tab.jsx
import { useRef, useState } from "react";
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from "swiper/react";
import SwiperCore from "swiper";
import "swiper/css";
import "swiper/css/navigation";
import "swiper/css/pagination";
import { Navigation, Pagination } from "swiper/modules";

const mainTabs = [
  {
    label: "Tiá»‡n Ã­ch",
    groups: [
      { label: "NgoÃ i trá»i", images: ["/img1.jpg", "/img2.jpg"] },
      { label: "Trong nhÃ ", images: ["/img3.jpg", "/img4.jpg"] },
    ],
  },
  {
    label: "Ná»™i tháº¥t",
    groups: [
      { label: "PhÃ²ng khÃ¡ch", images: ["/img5.jpg", "/img6.jpg"] },
      { label: "PhÃ²ng ngá»§", images: ["/img7.jpg", "/img8.jpg"] },
    ],
  },
];

export default function Tab() {
  const [activeMainTab, setActiveMainTab] = useState(0);
  const [activeSubTab, setActiveSubTab] = useState(0);
  const swiperRef = useRef(null);

  const currentGroups = mainTabs[activeMainTab].groups;
  const currentImages = currentGroups[activeSubTab].images;

  const handleMainTabClick = (index) => {
    setActiveMainTab(index);
    setActiveSubTab(0);
  };

  const handleSubTabClick = (index) => {
    setActiveSubTab(index);
  };

  const handleSlideChange = (swiper) => {
    const totalImages = currentGroups.reduce((acc, group) => acc + group.images.length, 0);
    const flatIndex = swiper.activeIndex;

    let imgCount = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < currentGroups.length; i++) {
      imgCount += currentGroups[i].images.length;
      if (flatIndex < imgCount) {
        setActiveSubTab(i);
        break;
      }
    }
  };

  const flatImages = currentGroups.flatMap((g) => g.images);

  return (
    <section className="p-6">
      {/* Main Tabs */}
      <div className="flex gap-4 mb-4">
        {mainTabs.map((tab, idx) => (
          <button
            key={idx}
            onClick={() => handleMainTabClick(idx)}
            className={`px-4 py-2 rounded ${activeMainTab === idx ? "bg-black text-white" : "bg-gray-200"}`}
          >
            {tab.label}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Sub Tabs */}
      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-4">
        {currentGroups.map((group, idx) => (
          <button
            key={idx}
            onClick={() => {
              setActiveSubTab(idx);
              const beforeCount = currentGroups.slice(0, idx).reduce((acc, g) => acc + g.images.length, 0);
              swiperRef.current?.slideTo(beforeCount);
            }}
            className={`px-3 py-1 rounded text-sm ${activeSubTab === idx ? "bg-blue-600 text-white" : "bg-gray-100"}`}
          >
            {group.label}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Swiper */}
      <Swiper
        modules={[Navigation, Pagination]}
        navigation
        pagination={{ clickable: true }}
        onSwiper={(swiper) => {
          swiperRef.current = swiper; // âœ… cÃ¡ch gÃ¡n Ä‘Ãºng
        }}
        onSlideChange={handleSlideChange}
        loop
      >
        {flatImages.map((img, idx) => (
          <SwiperSlide key={idx}>
            <img src={img} alt="" className="w-full h-64 object-cover rounded" />
          </SwiperSlide>
        ))}
      </Swiper>
    </section>
  );
}
```

```tsx
import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react';
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react';
import { Navigation, Pagination } from 'swiper/modules';
import SwiperCore from 'swiper';
import 'swiper/css';
import 'swiper/css/navigation';
import 'swiper/css/pagination';
import { motion } from 'framer-motion';

const data = [
  {
    main: 'Tiá»‡n Ã­ch',
    subs: [
      {
        sub: 'NgoÃ i trá»i',
        images: ['1.jpg', '2.jpg'],
      },
      {
        sub: 'NgoÃ i trá»i 2',
        images: ['3.jpg', '4.jpg'],
      },
      {
        sub: 'Trong nhÃ ',
        images: ['5.jpg', '6.jpg'],
      },
    ],
  },
  {
    main: 'Ná»™i tháº¥t',
    subs: [
      {
        sub: 'PhÃ²ng khÃ¡ch',
        images: ['7.jpg', '8.jpg'],
      },
      {
        sub: 'PhÃ²ng ngá»§',
        images: ['9.jpg', '10.jpg'],
      },
    ],
  },
];

export default function Tab() {
  const [activeMain, setActiveMain] = useState(0);
  const [activeSub, setActiveSub] = useState(0);

  const swiperRef = useRef<SwiperCore | null>(null);

  // Gá»™p toÃ n bá»™ áº£nh cá»§a cÃ¡c sub-tab thuá»™c main tab hiá»‡n táº¡i
  const currentSlides = data[activeMain].subs.flatMap((s) =>

      img,
      sub: s.sub,
    }))
  );

  const subTabStartIndex = data[activeMain].subs.map((s) => s.images.length).reduce((acc, len, i) => {
    acc.push((acc[i - 1] || 0) + len);
    return acc;
  }, []);

  const onSlideChange = (swiper: SwiperCore) => {
    const index = swiper.realIndex;

    let sum = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < data[activeMain].subs.length; i++) {
      sum += data[activeMain].subs[i].images.length;
      if (index < sum) {
        setActiveSub(i);
        break;
      }

  const onSwiper = (swiper: SwiperCore) => {

            onClick={() => {

              setActiveSub(0);
              setTimeout(() => {
                swiperRef.current?.slideTo(0);
              }, 0);
            }}
            className={`px-4 py-2 rounded ${

            }`}
          >
            {d.main}
          </button>

        {data[activeMain].subs.map((s, i) => (
          <button
            key={i}
            onClick={() => {
              const slideIndex = data[activeMain].subs
                .slice(0, i)
                .reduce((acc, sub) => acc + sub.images.length, 0);
              swiperRef.current?.slideTo(slideIndex);
            }}
            className={`px-3 py-1 border rounded ${
              i === activeSub ? 'bg-black text-white' : 'bg-gray-100'
            }`}
          >
            {s.sub}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Swiper */}
      <Swiper
        onSwiper={onSwiper}
        onSlideChange={onSlideChange}
        modules={[Pagination]}
        pagination={{ clickable: true }}
        loop={true}
        className="w-full"
      >
        {currentSlides.map((s, i) => (
          <SwiperSlide key={i}>
            <motion.div
              initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
              className="w-full h-[300px] bg-gray-100 flex items-center justify-center"
            >
              <img
                src={`/images/${s.img}`}
                alt={s.sub}
                className="w-full h-full object-cover"
              />
            </motion.div>
          </SwiperSlide>
        ))}
      </Swiper>
    </section>
  );
}
```

export default function Tab() {
  const [activeMain, setActiveMain] = useState(0);
  const [activeSub, setActiveSub] = useState(0);

  const swiperRef = useRef(null)

  // Gá»™p toÃ n bá»™ áº£nh cá»§a cÃ¡c sub-tab thuá»™c main tab hiá»‡n táº¡i
  const currentSlides = data[activeMain].subs.flatMap((s) =>
    s.public.map((img) => ({
      img,
      sub: s.sub,
    }))
  );

  const subTabStartIndex = data[activeMain].subs.map((s) => s.public.length).reduce((acc, len, i) => {
    acc.push((acc[i - 1] || 0) + len);
    return acc;
  }, []);

  const onSlideChange = (swiper) => {
    const index = swiper.realIndex;

    let sum = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < data[activeMain].subs.length; i++) {
      sum += data[activeMain].subs[i].public.length;
      if (index < sum) {
        setActiveSub(i);
        break;
      }
    }
  };

  const onSwiper = (swiper) => {
    swiperRef.current = swiper;
  };

  return (
    <section className="w-full px-4 py-8">
      {/* Main Tabs */}
      <div className="flex space-x-4 mb-4">
        {data.map((d, i) => (
          <button
            key={i}
            onClick={() => {
              setActiveMain(i);
              setActiveSub(0);
              setTimeout(() => {
                swiperRef.current?.slideTo(0);
              }, 0);
            }}
            className={`px-4 py-2 rounded ${
              i === activeMain ? 'bg-black text-white' : 'bg-gray-200'
            }`}
          >
            {d.main}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Sub Tabs */}
      <div className="flex space-x-2 mb-4 overflow-x-auto">
        {data[activeMain].subs.map((s, i) => (
          <button
            key={i}
            onClick={() => {
              const slideIndex = data[activeMain].subs
                .slice(0, i)
                .reduce((acc, sub) => acc + sub.public.length, 0);
              swiperRef.current?.slideTo(slideIndex);
            }}
            className={`px-3 py-1 border rounded ${
              i === activeSub ? 'bg-black text-white' : 'bg-gray-100'
            }`}
          >
            {s.sub}
          </button>
        ))}
      </div>

<div className="relative">
  {/* Swiper */}
      <Swiper
        onSwiper={onSwiper}
        onSlideChange={onSlideChange}
        modules={[Pagination]}
        pagination={{ clickable: true }}
        loop={true}
        className="w-full"
      >
     {currentSlides.map((s, i) => (
  <SwiperSlide key={i}>
    <motion.div
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      className="w-full h-[300px] bg-gray-100 flex items-center justify-center relative"
    >
      <img
        src={`/${s.img}`}
        alt={s.alt}
        className="w-full h-full object-cover"
      />
      {s.desc && (
        <p className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-full bg-black bg-opacity-50 text-white text-sm p-2">
          {s.desc}
        </p>
      )}
    </motion.div>
  </SwiperSlide>
))}

      </Swiper>
</div>
   
    </section>
  );
}

```jsx
import 'swiper/css/autoplay';
import { Autoplay } from 'swiper/modules';

const images = [
  '/img1.jpg',
  '/img2.jpg',
  '/img3.jpg',
  '/img4.webp',
  '/img5.webp',
];

export default function Collection() {
  return (
    <main className="xl:flex justify-center">
      <div className="w-full px-2 py-5 xl:w-2/3 relative">
        <Swiper
          modules={[Autoplay]}
          loop={true}
          autoplay={{ delay: 4500, disableOnInteraction: false }}
          spaceBetween={10}
          breakpoints={{
            0: { slidesPerView: 1.1 },
            640: { slidesPerView: 2 },
            1280: { slidesPerView: 1.2 },
          }}
        >
          {images.map((src, i) => (
            <SwiperSlide key={i}>
              <div className="relative w-full h-[320px]">
                <img
                  src={src}
                  alt={`img-${i}`}
                  className="object-cover w-full h-full rounded-xl shadow-lg"
                />
              </div>
            </SwiperSlide>
          ))}
        </Swiper>
      </div>
    </main>
  );
}
```

Installation
Get started with Tailwind CSS
Tailwind CSS works by scanning all of your HTML files, JavaScript components, and any other templates for class names, generating the corresponding styles and then writing them to a static CSS file.
It's fast, flexible, and reliable â€” with zero-runtime.
Installation
	â€¢	Using Vite
	â€¢	Using PostCSS
	â€¢	Tailwind CLI
	â€¢	Framework Guides
	â€¢	Play CDN
Installing Tailwind CSS as a Vite plugin
Installing Tailwind CSS as a Vite plugin is the most seamless way to integrate it with frameworks like Laravel, SvelteKit, React Router, Nuxt, and SolidJS.
01
Create your project
Start by creating a new Vite project if you donâ€™t have one set up already. The most common approach is to use Create Vite.
Terminal
npm create vite@latest my-project
cd my-project
02
Install Tailwind CSS
Install tailwindcss and @tailwindcss/vite via npm.
Terminal
npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite
03
Configure the Vite plugin
Add the @tailwindcss/vite plugin to your Vite configuration.
vite.config.ts
import { defineConfig } from 'vite'
import tailwindcss from '@tailwindcss/vite'
export default defineConfig({
 plugins: [
   tailwindcss(),
 ],
})
04
Import Tailwind CSS
Add an @import to your CSS file that imports Tailwind CSS.
CSS
@import "tailwindcss";
05
Start your build process
Run your build process with npm run dev or whatever command is configured in your package.json file.
Terminal
npm run dev
06
Start using Tailwind in your HTML
Make sure your compiled CSS is included in the <head> (your framework might handle this for you), then start using Tailwindâ€™s utility classes to style your content.
HTML
<!doctype html>
<html>
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
 <link href="/src/style.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
 <h1 class="text-3xl font-bold underline">
   Hello world!
 </h1>
</body>
</html>
